page.title: 09BOLEY PARK LICHFIELD
page.content: I live on a building estate which is not quite finished.One building company has completed 48 houses and 3 are being built.They started building the houses in 1983.They would like the estate finished by June 1985.Most houses have 4 bedrooms but 12 rooms altogether. One house takes about 13 weeks to build.They start work at 8 O'clock and finish at 5 O'clock.The prices vary from #44,750 to #61,000. On the estate there is a Co-op Superstore,a Hairdresser,a Newsagent,a Chemist,a Public House,a Petrol Station and a Community Hall.Parties and Discos are held there.There is also a park being landscaped. The whole estate is being developed by many companies,and is one of the largest housing developments in the country.The area is being surveyed to incorporate this area on an O.S.Map.
